page.title: 09UNITED DOWNS.
page.content: My group studied{United Downs.}We found that there was not one amenity there.The whole of the area is covered with abandoned tin and copper mine workings. Up to about 100 years ago there were many mines working there. Today there are several ruined engine houses there. Two have been renovated. In Cornish an old engine house is called a{"knacked {bal".} Tregarlands farmhouse used to be a public house called The Miners Arms. Today some of{United Downs}has been planted with trees and another part has been cleared for small factories to be built.
